amendment.description: To modify the funding provided for the Advanced Research Projects Agency-Energy.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2965 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 37. Record Vote Number: 9.

action.text: Amendment SA 2965 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Schatz to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S245-247; text: CR S247) To modify the funding provided for the Advanced Research Projects Agency-Energy.
